function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of organizational resilience in construction businesses","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to environmental shocks such as contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing organizational resilience strategies and agile business models","Technologies":"Technological advancements for rapid adaptability and response","People":"Construction businesses","Owner":"Management and leadership of construction businesses"},{"Description":"Failure to adapt to ongoing environmental disruptions","Impact":"Decreased ability to survive and prosper in uncertain market conditions","Mitigation":"Implementing change management processes and agile principles","Technologies":"Innovative methods and technologies for swift response to uncertainties","People":"Construction businesses","Owner":"Management and leadership of construction businesses"},{"Description":"Ineffective culture based on resilience, change management, and agile principles","Impact":"Reduced capacity to anticipate, prepare for, and adapt to changes in the environment","Mitigation":"Implementing a culture that promotes resilience, change management, and agile principles","Technologies":"Training programs and organizational development tools for culture change","People":"Employees of construction businesses","Owner":"Human resources and management"}]}
